programme.title: Best of SafariLIVE
programme.desc: The absolute best in LIVE Safari, filmed over the last 5 years. Filled with iconic wildlife and unique, serendipitous moments in the African bush, this show is not to be missed.

programme.desc: Jump on board a real LIVE safari from Africa as the sun is rising. Follow and interact with the real life stories of some of Africa’s most iconic animals.
